post.author: 이성기
post.content:
Hello, Hope you are doing great !! This is Masi from CAT Technology Inc. I have a hot position for you. .If you are interested and available please forward your updated resume with your best number to reach ASAP.
Title: Senior J2EE websphere Programmer Location: Memphis, TN Duration: 3 months Rate: $35/hr
Required Skills: 3+ Years in Java programming Familiar with WebSphere applications servers, Struts, SOAP, MVC, JSP, JDBC, SQL, XML, Spring Framework Experience with OO design and development, WebSphere Development IDE (or Eclipse), and XHTML/CSS/JavaScript Also possess good verbal and written communication skills.
Other Skill AS/400 experience, Spring Framework, CVS, Patterns (Singleton, Factory, Synchronizer Token), VeriSign, AJAX, and Adobe Creative Suite. A Candidates with Lotus Notes development and/or administration experience will be given special consideration.
Thanks, Masi CAT Technology Inc. 'Committed to Human Excellence Through IT ' 377 Route 17 South Hasbrouck Heights, New Jersey. Voice: 201 257 5081 x 280 Fax: 201 727 9296 masi@catstaffing-us.com
post.title: Senior J2EE websphere Programmer [Max Rate $35/hr]
